attributes.action: Change the age requirements for social media from 13 to a minimum of 16
attributes.additional_details: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and TikTok to name a few only require a person to be 13 to create an account which can easily be circumvented by using a fake date of birth, this could be solved by having a minimum age of 16 to set up a personal account or for an adult to create the account with a verified ID and have it linked to their own account, if it was a requirement to provide valid ID that would also stop trolls and predators creating multiple accounts and would protect children
attributes.background: There is an ever increasing amount of trolling and predators affecting many young people in schools this could be somewhat mitigated by requiring users to be a minimum of 16, providing a verified ID to stop fake accounts or if under 16 the account should be verified by a parent or legal guardian

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure whether you want a legal minimum age for social media accounts, or for parental verification for social media ccounts. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
